ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/java var actionDate = now() as String {format: "yyyy-MM-dd"} var owner = "UHIS" --- { national_id: payload.nationalID, street_address: payload.address.streetAddress, country: payload.address.country, city: payload.address.city, date_of_birth: payload.dateOfBirth, case_type: payload.caseType, last_name: payload.lastName, source: payload.source, national_id_type: payload.nationalID, update_date: actionDate, create_by: owner, phone: payload.phone, state: payload.address.state, postal: payload.address.postal, create_date: actionDate, update_by: owner, first_name: payload.firstName, email: payload.email }

db:insert.doc:name: Insert COVID CASE MASTER
db:insert.db:sql: insert into cvd_case_master (source, case_type, first_name, last_name, phone, email, date_of_birth, national_id, national_id_type, street_address, city, state, postal, country, create_date, update_date, create_by, update_by) values (:source, :case_type, :first_name, :last_name, :phone, :email, to_date(:date_of_birth,'YYYY-MM-DD'), :national_id, :national_id_type, :street_address, :city, :state, :postal, :country, to_date(:create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(:update_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), :create_by, :update_by)

db:select.db:sql: select max(case_id) as case_id from cvd_case_master where national_id = nationalid
